favourite.article: This song fills me with joy and encourages me to seek the Lord every day until His return. May we all press on with song in our hearts and on our lips!
As the wise virgins we must be prepared! Jesus is coming again! Oh Lord Jesus . Amen
Oh Lord Jesus, Amen. Oh que hemoso himno de la venida del señor debemos prepararnos como vírgenes sabias y llenar nuestras vasijas de aceite que es El Espiritu santo. Amen.
Dear Lord deliver me from the folly of unpreparedness for Your coming despite the glaring signs around. AMEN.
This hymn was flowing in my spirit as I was considering all the wonderful work in the former Soviet Union and He IS coming!
This hymn will help us to determine this question - are we the foolish or wise virgins? So, as wise virgins we must be prepared everyday for Jesus is now on His way. Watch, for we know not the day.
